mapper.select: select * from GBF_Item_Info where id = #{ id }
select * from GBF_Item_Info where patch = #{ patch }

insert into GBF_Item_Info (patch, category_type, image, is_display_select_item, item_id, name, number, user_id, create_time) values(#{ patch }, #{ category_type }, #{ image }, #{ is_display_select_item }, #{ item_id }, #{ name }, #{ number }, #{ user_id }, #{ create_time })
